title: For sale: Brown Hindu Birmingham and H. Davis sold
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: For sale: Brown Hindu Birmingham and H. Davis sold
posts.post_content:
Birmingham SGC 30 sold
H Davis SGC 10 sold



Nice cards for the grade, particularly the Birmingham. Add $4 for shipping - PM with questions or to confirm purchase.

Thanks

Chris
PM sent on the Davis card, thanks
PM sent on the Joe Birmingham
